ResourceHeader.Description:
Low Energy Telescope (LET): ~1-20 MeV/n P, He, and heavier nuclei using a dE/dx vs. E telescope with pha capability
LET is one of five instruments that make up the COSPIN suite on the Ulysses spacecraft. LET was built, and primary data analysis is maintained, by ESTEC, Noordwijk, The Netherlands

InformationURL.Name: LET Instrument User Notes
InformationURL.Description: User Notes about the LET experiment on the Ulysses mission.

InformationURL.Name: LET Instrument Handbook
InformationURL.Description: Information about the LET experiment on the Ulysses mission.
